TextView.android:text: Name of the Peths Who founded the Peth and Year in which it was founded

Kasba Peth : Rashtrakuta kings in the 5th century
 
Guruwar Peth : Shahaji Raje 1625
 
Somwar Peth : Dadoji Konddev 1636
 
Mangalwar Peth : Dadoji Konddev 1637
 
Shukrwar Peth : Nilopant Mujumdar 1670
 
Raviwar Peth : Nilopant Mujumdar 1670
 
Shaniwar Peth : Moropant Pingale 1675
 
Bhavani Peth : Sambhaji Maharaj 1682 The name is derived from the temple of Bhavani Mata
 
Ghorpade Peth : Senapati Santaji Ghorpade 1692 in his memory
 
Wednesday Peth : Aurangzeb 1703
 
Ganesh Peth : Sakharambapu Bokil Name of Ganesha after 1748
 
Sadashiv Peth : Sadashivrao Peshwa 1757 in his memory
 
Narayan Peth : Narayanrao Peshwa 1770 in his memory
 
Rasta Peth : Sardar Rasta 1780 in his memory
 
Nana Peth : Nana Fadnavis 1783 in his memory
 
Ganj Peth : (now called Mahatma Phule Peth) In memory of Mahatma Phule after 1818 by the British government
 
Since Navi Peth was newly established by the British government after 1818
